mapper.select: select chat_id as chatId,from_email as fromEmail, to_email as toEmail, chat_content as chatContent, chat_time as chatTime from tbl_chat where ((#{fromEmail}=from_email and #{toEmail}=to_email) or (#{fromEmail}=to_email and #{toEmail}=from_email)) order by chat_time

select chat_id as chatId,from_email as fromEmail, to_email as toEmail, chat_content as chatContent, chat_time as chatTime from tbl_chat where ((#{fromEmail}=from_email and #{toEmail}=to_email) or (#{fromEmail}=to_email and #{toEmail}=from_email)) and chat_id>(select max(chat_id)-#{chatId} from tbl_chat) order by chat_time

select chat_id as chatId,from_email as fromEmail, to_email as toEmail, chat_content as chatContent, chat_time as chatTime from tbl_chat where chat_id in(select max(chat_id) from tbl_chat where to_email = #{userEmail} or from_email = #{userEmail} group by from_email,to_email)
